item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜亚告诉记者，她在 2024 年俄罗斯总统选举的选票上写下了亡夫的名字。
item.description:
Alexei Navalny’s widow, Yulia Navalnaya, told reporters that she wrote her late husband’s name on her ballot for the 2024 Russian presidential election.

President Vladimir Putin won, extending his reign in an election whose outcome was never in doubt. pic.twitter.com/I1tAuNGqZv

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 18, 2024
